QuestData.Title: Kill the Courier
QuestData.Description: Thank you, $c, for braving the horrors of this dark and terrible place.$B$BThe bowels of Grim Batol are the heart of Cho'gall's war machine. If we are to stop his machinations throughout the Highlands, we must learn all we can from these depths.$B$BSeek out Drahga Shadowburner within. He is Cho'gall's runner, the link between here and the Bastion of Twilight. We must learn the secrets he carries.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: He is Cho'gall's eyes and ears in Grim Batol. We must learn his secrets.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Drahga Shadowburner and grab his Missive to Cho'gall.
QuestData.RewardText: <Tooranu looks over the documents you discovered.>$B$BIt's all here, $N. Details of how the cult is tearing up the Highlands, who they've sent, where they are, and what they plan to do. Invaluable.$B$BI shall distribute this knowledge to the rest of the Earthen Ring at once. Thank you, friend.
